full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 765 Filed 08/10/22 Page 58 of 95 2796 LCI1MAX1
1 THE COURT: So I think that's the request. So line 18 on my page 50, which is the second page of Instruction No. 36, we will cut comma, "including at times Maxwell," comma.
2 MR. ROHRBACH: And in light of that change, your Honor, on line 11 of that page, it should say, "The indictment alleges as follows."
3 THE COURT: Right. On line 11, changing "reads" to "alleges."
4 What's next, Mr. Everdell?
5 MR. EVERDELL: Yes, your Honor. It's on page 51, line 15. I think we've been using "Ms. Maxwell" in this charge, so we'll change on line 15 "the defendant" to "Ms. Maxwell."
6 MR. ROHRBACH: That's fine, your Honor.
7 THE COURT: Okay. So we're on Instruction No. 36. Close to the end of that, the second to last paragraph of that instruction, line 15, changing "the defendant" to "Ms. Maxwell."
8 So one question. We've taken Kate out of the overt acts. Page 51, lines 13 through 16 are no longer seem to make sense.
9 MR. EVERDELL: 51, your Honor?
10 THE COURT: Yeah. Right?
11 MR. EVERDELL: Well, I understand what you're saying with respect to reference to overt acts because she's not in
12 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
